price: 17. Мре тропа baye bamitiyaki o nzela ya semba, akokamba bango koleka mpe akobakisela bango bobangi na bango.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
